name: Steam charts
description: The app displays top record numbers of players online. You can view online players charts by each Steams game and monitor its highest peak.   The Top section displays top 10 games, according to the number of concurrent players online.   The Trending section displays the list of most popular games.  All data is powered by Steam. Not affiliated with Valve in any way. All trademarks are property of their respective owners in the US and other countries. Our goal is to provide unique insight into gaming trends.
